channel.title: A world with dragons
channel.description: Shuyang's personal blog, built with <3 using Jekyll and served thru GitHub Pages.

item.title: Hello, world!
item.description:
Hello, world!

This is Shuyang’s blog, built with Jekyll and written entirely with Sublime Text. I said so many times that I’d start writing, but I can never find the perfect platform. I think this will suffice at least for a while :)

Since currently there’s nothing here, you can take a look at my website just for fun.

Stay tuned!
